Package io.elegie.luchess.app.lucene4x.explore

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractQueryImpl
    A base class for all queries, which provides access to the index manager, so that they can properly query the index.
    GameFindQueryImpl
    A simple implementation of the GameFindQuery, which lets us retrieve a game by its id, looking up the ID field of all documents, with a TermQuery.
    GameFindQueryResultImpl
    A simple implementation of the GameFindQueryResult, wrapping the sought game.
    GameListQueryBuilder
    This class is used to create a GameListQuery, combining the different filled search criteria into the target query.
    GameListQueryCollector
    This collector wraps a TopScoreDocCollector, and lets us accumulate data regarding continuations.
    GameListQueryImpl
    Our implementation of the GameListQuery.
    GameListQueryPayloadFunction
    A payload function that simply returns 1 as payload score.
    GameListQueryResultImpl
    A simple POJO implementation for the #GameListQueryResult.
    GameListQuerySimilarity
    The default similarity, extended so as to provide the payload to the collector.
    GameListQuerySorter
    This sorter makes sure that games having high elo are boosted, as they might be more interesting to the clients.
